entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
